column2: an A.M. Eatery////Once we sat our server was super nice and explained the pancake of the day to us. I ordered the Corned Beef Hash and a Pineapple Upside Down Pancake Â "ahh la carte". The food was definitely worth the wait! The corned beef hash was filling and was really good
column3: not too salty as many corned beef hashes tend to be. The pineapple upside down pancake was definitely my FAVORITE! It's like dessert for breakfast and I saved the best for last.
